title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with local models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you swap Ollama models into any chain or agent.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI that talks to your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI wrapper with readline history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement for VS Code.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal SvelteKit chat UI that streams responses from Ollama over SSE.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; supports streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama generators & embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async IEnumerables for streaming chat.

title: ollama-copilot-vim
summary: Vim/Neovim plugin that brings local LLM code completions via Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir wrapper using Finch for HTTP and GenServer for stateful chats.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community-maintained Go client with context cancellation and SSE streaming.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama binaries and a NixOS module for declarative model cache.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run docker-compose stack with Ollama, WebUI, and GPU runtime presets.

title: ollama-reddit-discussion
summary: Community roundup of new tools, clients and model tricks around Ollama (May 2024).
